title: American Talent Tyler Stites to Join European Peloton with Caja Rural-Seguros RGA
content:
'I want to win a pro race': Stites will be the first American on the Spanish second-tier squad since Justin Oien raced in 2017-18.

Read the full article at American Talent Tyler Stites to Join European Peloton with Caja Rural-Seguros RGA on Velo.
author: ahood
